stadium.name: The Old Fort
stadium.description: The team plays within the crumbling, stone-ringed ruins of an ancient hill-fort. The 'runes' are just old, weathered carvings on the standing stones that serve as obstacles.

stats.pregame_ritual: Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Spitting into their own hand and then slapping their face with it.
Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
A toast of goat's milk to the health of their rivals.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.

stadium.name: The Guilder's Field
stadium.description: An opulent stadium sponsored by the powerful Merchant's Guild. The stands feature luxurious, velvet-lined boxes for bankers, who are often more focused on making deals than the game.

stats.pregame_ritual: Washing their hands with dirt.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Meticulously cleaning each stud on their boots with a special brush.
Eating a raw onion, layer by layer, without crying.
Getting a teammate to pour a bucket of cold water over their head.
A team-wide moment of absolute silence to 'gather their thoughts'.
Sharpening the edges of their blunted weapon (an exercise in futility).
Humming a tune they believe only they know.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.

preGame:
# üèÜ PLAYOFFS: GAME ONE - THE ROAD TO GLORY! üèÜ

Step right up, ladies and gentlemen, demons and ghouls! It‚Äôs a beautiful, foggy afternoon here at **The Old Fort** in Kerlauger, and the atmosphere is absolutely electric! We are kicking off a Best-of-Three series that will determine who marches closer to the championship and who gets booted into the loser's bracket! The stakes are higher than the Demon Prison‚Äôs walls, and the fans are pouring in! I see a massive contingent of **The New Prosperity Profits** fans‚Äîclearly, that Merchant Guild money can buy a lot of carriage rides! The local **Kerlauger Runeguard** fans might be fewer in number, but they‚Äôre howling in the mist like King Nezmear‚Äôs pet werewolves!

Speaking of the Profits, I caught a glimpse of their pre-game preparations. **Pulchi Benyamin** was seen devouring a dandelion, stem and all‚Äîtalk about high fiber for high performance! Meanwhile, **Yoshi Cathy** is over there weeping... not out of fear, mind you, but because he‚Äôs eating a raw onion layer by layer! That‚Äôs the kind of dedication that makes a demon proud! On the other side, the Runeguard are getting physical early; **Lashondra Niehaus** just had a teammate punch her in the shoulder hard enough to rattle her ancestors! That‚Äôs the spirit! 

We‚Äôre playing in **The Old Fort**, folks, and the conditions are perfect for a massacre! The **Dense Fog** is so thick you can‚Äôt see your own hand in front of your face, and the **Uneven Footing** is sure to snap a few ankles before the first whistle! Whether you‚Äôre a fan of the Guild of the Black Sky or those White Raven 'heroes,' you‚Äôre in for a treat. I personally hope the **Ebon Gate Corruptors** are watching, because this is how you play a real game‚Äîunlike those soft-bellied **Haven Lights**! Let‚Äôs get to the carnage!
postGame:
# üèÅ POST-GAME WRAP-UP: AN OVERTIME THRILLER! üèÅ

What a game! What a finish! My heart is pounding harder than a stone-giant's drum! After a grueling regulation period where neither team could find the basket, we went into **Sudden Death Overtime**, and boy, did it deliver! The Kerlauger Runeguard have defended their home ruins with a final score of **2 to 0**! This puts them up 1-0 in this Best-of-Three series! The New Prosperity Profits had the popularity and the gold, but the Runeguard had the grit and the stones‚Äîliterally!

We started the second half with everyone fresh off the healer‚Äôs bench, but the peace didn‚Äôt last long! **Lon Gabriell** of the Runeguard snatched that troll head right out of the gate in Center Field! The Profits tried to shut it down early, with **Faina Hendrix** putting a massive hit on **Reginauld Cordell**, but Cordell stood his ground like a statue of Garon Ironrock himself! The physical play was off the charts right from the jump!

Then came the first real taste of blood! **Aufmann Tedric** for the Profits absolutely leveled **Vivia Namara**, sending her straight to the healer‚Äôs tent! It was a beautiful sight, folks! Just pure, unadulterated violence in the fog! The Runeguard tried to respond, but the footing was treacherous. **Lorilee Aldred** looked like she had a clear path, but she threw a pass so wild it would have hit a flying harpy if **Aufmann Tedric** hadn't stepped in for the **INTERCEPTION**! A massive turnover that silenced the local crowd!

But the Runeguard aren‚Äôt known for backing down! **Johnna Beetner** decided she‚Äôd had enough of **Yoshi Cathy‚Äôs** onion-breath and tackled him into next week! Cathy was **INJURED** on the play, leaving a gap in the Profits' line! It was a back-and-forth slugfest that saw **Pulchi Benyamin** retaliate by taking out **Harilda Sigsmond**! I haven't seen this much medical magic used since Sir Tanos tried to read a map!

The injuries just kept piling up! **Reginauld Cordell** managed to catch **Abramson Doxia** with a brutal tackle, sending another Profit to the sidelines. The Profits were desperately trying to move the ball, with **Krueger Jacinthe** and **Pulchi Benyamin** making valiant runs toward the goal, but the Runeguard defense was as solid as the ancient stones of the fort! 

As we neared the end of regulation, **Faina Hendrix** had the chance of a lifetime! He took a shot from Home Field, aiming for that two-point glory, but the ball sailed wide! You could hear the groan from the Profits' velvet-lined boxes all the way back in New Prosperity! **Gladdie Farika** scrambled to pick up the loose head as the clock ticked down, forcing us into a heart-stopping **OVERTIME** period!

In Overtime, everything changed! The healers did their work, and everyone was back on the field for the final showdown. The tension was so thick you could carve it like one of Chairman Toland‚Äôs cheeses! The ball was live, and **Reginauld Cordell** scooped it up with the grace of a shadow king! He didn't waste a single second, looking for an opening in the Profits' exhausted defense.

Then came the moment of destiny! **Harilda Sigsmond**, who had been knocked out earlier in the game, showed the world what a real warrior looks like! Standing in the Home Field, Sigsmond took aim and let that troll head fly! It soared through the misty air, clearing the rim and hitting the basket perfectly for a **2-point SHOOT**! The crowd went absolutely feral! The fog couldn't hide the joy on those faces!

Final score: **The Kerlauger Runeguard 2, The New Prosperity Profits 0**. The Profits might have the civic engagement and the literacy, but today they lacked the finishing touch! Chairman Brennen Farno is going to be clutching his coin purse tightly tonight after this loss! Maybe they should spend less time cleaning their boots and more time practicing their aim!

Don't go anywhere, folks! This series is just getting started! Can the Profits bounce back in Game 2, or will the Runeguard sweep them into the dirt? We‚Äôll find out soon! Until then, this is Nok the Corrupter reminding you: if you aren't bleeding, you aren't playing! Hail to the Corruptors, and someone get those Haven Lights a box of tissues! Goodnight, Osterra!
